meotsuamt.jcr:title: Amsterdam Short-Sleeve Travel Shirt
meotsuamt.features:
• Cotton/polyester/spandex blend wicks moisture and has a soft hand
  • Fabric has a touch of stretch to ease movements
  • Button placket lets you adjust the ventilation
  • Classic fit that follows body contours without being tight
meotsuamt.reviews:
By gregorio from Saint Paul, MN
I use this for hiking, travel, and as casual wear to the bar. It's so functional and easy to clean that I'm taking two shirts with me to Senegal, Africa for two years with the Peace Corps.
meotsuamt.summary: The Amsterdam travel shirt features a soft, breathable fabric blend that keeps you comfortable on city adventures.

meotsuann.jcr:title: Analog Dark Wash Jean
meotsuann.features:
• Button fly closure
  • Regular rise
  • Two front pockets
  • One buttoned coin pocket
  • Three back pockets
  • Twisted outseams
meotsuann.reviews:
By GBAus from Austin, TX
The style is mature and straight. Mature meaning I don't look like a 44 year old guy trying to be 24 with baggy cargo pockets all over. My only wish is that they came in carbon color.
By jamesm from New York
These are great looking jeans and feel really nice when new. However, I have had several pairs that fade in days - not months. Quality is not what it should be in a pair of jeans at this price level.
meotsuann.summary: From the city streets to the climbing crag, the Analog Dark Wash Jean gives you old-school style.

meotsubat.jcr:title: Baja Plaid Shirt
meotsubat.features:
• Woven lyocell/polyester blend wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable
  • Fabric also offers a soft hand, natural drape and wrinkle resistance
  • Relaxed fit provides easy movement that maximizes comfort without compromising your look
meotsubat.reviews:
By GBAus from Austin, TX
These shirts have gone to Europe with me on multiple occasions and make a great dressy casual shirt worn out with slacks or a good every day shirt worn with jeans or casual pants. This shirt is without a doubt my favorite among all of my casual button up shirts. I find that unlike one of the other reviewers, that the XL large fits me well, but admittedly, since I wear these shirts out most of the time, I am not concerned about a little extra bulk.
By Tall Bill from NE Illinois
Really nice fabric, heavier than I thought it would be. Also appeared to be well made. But the sizing is a bit off (for me, anyhow). I may exchange it for an extra large, but the increase in size will have to be drastic to accommodate me, and not having an extra large sized waist, I'll probably wind up with an excess of shirt to tuck in and make me look dumpy and overweight.
meotsubat.summary: Look good and feel great on the road, on the beach or out with friends in the Baja plaid shirt.

meotsucan.jcr:title: Canyonlands Jean
meotsucan.features:
• Cotton supplies natural, next-to-skin comfort; the fusion of polyester helps manage moisture
  • Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays
  • Sanded and distressed for softness and feature a traditional 5-pocket design
meotsucan.reviews:
By Triathlete Surfer from Carlsbad, CA
Where form and function are both outstanding. One of the most fashionable pair of jeans in my closet, they are the most comfortable. I take care of a two and four year old so whether bending, crouching, squatting, stepping up, riding on a bike, walking, napping, chasing toddlers, these jeans just do it right. They move with the body yet retain a fashionable look. Sincerely the best jeans I've ever owned. And you should see my closet. Finally, the quest for the "that" pair of jeans is over.
meotsucan.summary: Don't be fooled by the standard look of the Canyonlands Jean! They are made with cotton and CoolMaxx polyester for awesome moisture management.

meotsudyt.jcr:title: Dylan Leather Wallet
meotsudyt.features:
• Exterior receipt pocket.
  • European rounded edges.
  • Calfskin leather.
meotsudyt.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotsudyt.summary: The Dylan Wallet is a classic sleek billfold wallet with two currency pockets and five credit card slots.

meotsuett.jcr:title: Eton Short-Sleeve Shirt
meotsuett.features:
• 100% cotton fabric
  • Classic stripes at sleeve add appeal
  • Traditional fit is not too tight, not too loose
meotsuett.reviews:
By BEACH MAN from POMPANO BEACH FL
GOOD T-SHIRT.
By RyanScreen from Collegedale, TN
Bought a small in this shirt. It feels much larger than any other small I've tried on before. It's fine if you like your shirts baggy, otherwise I would suggest downsizing.
meotsuett.summary: Express yourself around town or at play with our rugby-inspired Eton shirt.

meotsuexn.jcr:title: Explorer Jean
meotsuexn.features:
• Mayflower Wash
  • Zip and button fly closure
  • Novelty back waistband trim
  • Distressed detail at knees and seat
  • 5 Pocket
meotsuexn.reviews:
By Diane from Cincy from Cincinnati, OH
Product was delivered quickly and in time for Christmas morning! My son asked for these pants as a second pair to the one he purchased while in California last summer.
meotsuexn.summary: From the skate park to the nightclub, the Explorer Jean gives you the right amount of style and comfort to keep you on top of your game.

meotsumit.jcr:title: Milano Leather Belt
meotsumit.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotsumit.summary: Handcrafted belt is designed with embossed Italian leather belt designed with two keepers.

meotsusan.jcr:title: Saturday Jean
meotsusan.features:
• All the way relaxed
  • Vintage wash jeans
  • 5 pockets
  • Zip fly and button closure
  • Logo patch on back right waistband
  • Classic straight leg fit
  • Straight from the knee down
meotsusan.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotsusan.summary: Lightweight denim and a sun faded wash make the Saturday Jean perfect for the weekend or for any casual day of the week.

meotsutrs.jcr:title: Tribeca Cargo Pants
meotsutrs.features:
• Organic cotton is combined with linen for comfort and style
  • Front slant pockets and 2 cargo pockets stow your necessities
  • Pants include a zipper fly and a button at the waist; flat front
meotsutrs.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotsutrs.summary: Look good at the office or on a stroll through town with the classy Tribeca Cargo Pants.

meotsuvon.jcr:title: Vortex Jean
meotsuvon.features:
• 5 pockets
  • Zip fly and buttoned waistband
  • Belt loops
  • Low crotch
  • Slim leg
  • Slim Fit
  • Inseam: 32
meotsuvon.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotsuvon.summary: These jeans are great for almost any occasion, from a casual day at work to an afternoon at the local climbing area.

meotwibrt.jcr:title: Brooklyn Coat
meotwibrt.features:
• Removable faux fur trim
  • Includes a full-length zipper and webbing-mounted buttons on the front placket
  • Regular fit that is not too baggy, not too tight
meotwibrt.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotwibrt.summary: Protection from the elements doesn't mean you have to look like a mountaineer. The waterproof Brooklyn Coat keeps you looking sharp while shedding rain.

meotwicls.jcr:title: Classic Leather Gloves
meotwicls.features:
• Elastic at the wrists helps seal out wind and snow
  • Polyester lining helps wick sweat off your hands to keep them dry
meotwicls.reviews:
By Janet from St Paul
Ordered these gloves for my husband and he likes them. The leather is soft and polished and the lining is nice and soft.
meotwicls.summary: Leather gloves offer a low-bulk fit for excellent dexterity and a classic look that can be dressed up or down.

meotwiclt.jcr:title: Classic Pea Coat
meotwiclt.features:
• Wool blend offers natural water repellence in light moisture
  • Polyfill insulation adds extra warmth
  • Lapels can be buttoned up to the neck for added warmth
  • Tailored details include a back dart, bound seams, finished interior and button cuffs
meotwiclt.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotwiclt.summary: Classic good looks and handsome tailoring meet state-of-the-art insulation in our wool-blend pea coat.

meotwicot.jcr:title: Cool-Weight Ranier Shirt
meotwicot.features:
• Innovative hollow polyester yarn provides light insulation to help prevent heat from escaping
  • Fabric is lightweight and wrinkle resistant
  • Curved shirttail hem
meotwicot.reviews:
By Plover321 from Tosa, WI
I was looking for a heavier weight shirt that was super durable and comfy and I found it. The feel of this shirt is outstanding. It's soft yet still durable enough to take a beating. Definitely recommend.
meotwicot.summary: Stay warm while traveling without sacrificing your style with the Cool-Weight Ranier Shirt

meotwidot.jcr:title: Double Breasted Raincoat
meotwidot.features:
• All-season jacket is not only lightweight and compressible, but renowned for its water shedding, breathable performance and reliable comfort
  • Features a 2.5-layer waterproof, breathable polyurethane coating; ceramic particles add durability, waterproof reliability, and improved comfort
  • 100% taped seams seal out the elements
meotwidot.reviews:
By TomC from Albany, OR
I own two of these jackets and have worn them often in many activities (walking, hiking, backpacking, rafting) and different weather conditions over the last eight years. They have always kept me dry & comfortable and have proven to be quite breathable, especially when the pit zips are open.
meotwidot.summary: Our best selling Double Breasted Raincoat is now more waterproof, more breathable and more comfortable to wear!

meotwipot.jcr:title: Portland Hooded Jacket
meotwipot.features:
• Cotton canvas exterior is lined with warm polyester fleece to take the chill out of a winter day
  • Flip up the hood for protection against cool temperatures
  • Full-zip front allows easy on and off; chin guard protects your skin
meotwipot.reviews:
By 24601 from Boulder, CO
I was looking for a casual jacket that was warm, had nice features from my technical wear like protected sleeves (sealed wrists), headphone routing, and a hood.
But, I spend so much time wearing my technical gear, I don't want to don technical gear when I'm hanging out. I think it looks tacky but I love the function of it.
This jacket hits the jackpot on looking great, but being functional where I need it on a casual jacket.
meotwipot.summary: The Portland Hooded Jacket takes you from the office to the airport in style.

meotwislt.jcr:title: Slopeside Coat
meotwislt.features:
• Wear the shell jacket and zip-in liner jacket together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather conditions warrant; liner is reversible
  • Quilted liner jacket uses polyfiber insulation to keep you warm without inhibiting mobility
  • Liner jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets and an internal security pocket
meotwislt.reviews:
By PhilJeep from ALbuquerque, NM
The fit is great, appears to be durable, and has plenty of pockets. The coat is much warmer than you'd think it would be. I've used it in the mountains in northern New Mexico and southern Colorado. If you're hiking or snowshoeing, you'll be too warm unless it's below 25F and there's a slight breeze. If you're standing still, it'll probably be OK. I only have one complaint, and that's with the zip-in fleece liner. The material is really "sticky", so it's hard to put on without having your sleeves bunch up. The little tab that holds the liner in place by your wrist works when taking the coat off, but when putting it on, the liner tends to come out of the outer sleeve (3 or 4 inches) and then you have to stuff it back in. This isn't too bad is you put the coat on once and wear it all day, but if you tend to put it on and off several times a day, it gets to be pretty annoying. A simple nylon or other lining in the sleeve would get the coat a 5-star rating.
meotwislt.summary: 4-in-1 jacket creates options for changing conditions. Jacket sports a waterproof, breathable shell and an insulated, reversible liner jacket.

meotwisus.jcr:title: Sussex Rain Boots
meotwisus.features:
• Mid-height natural rubber uppers form a tough waterproof barrier to keep slush and puddles at bay
  • Shaft circumference is 15 in. and based on size 7; measurement is for the outside of the boot shaft and, in general, the internal measurement is roughly 1 in. shorter
  • Polyester microfleece linings are soft to the touch, wick moisture to regulate foot temperature and add insulation in cold weather
meotwisus.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotwisus.summary: Classic in style, the Sussex Rain Boots provide excellent waterproof protection and great traction.

meotwizuf.jcr:title: Zurich Wool Scarf
meotwizuf.features: • Lightweight merino wool design offers soft and luxurious warmth
meotwizuf.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.
meotwizuf.summary: Warp yourself in warmth this winter with the Zurich Scarf, woven in natural wool
